main_definition: In the context of direction, positioning or situations, 'facing' refers to being oriented towards a particular point, object, or situation.

meanings_and_examples.example: The house is facing the ocean, so you can see the sunset from every room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Confronting or dealing with a problem directly
meanings_and_examples.example: She had to face her fears of public speaking by volunteering for more presentations at work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adjacent to, or having something immediately on either side
meanings_and_examples.example: Our house has a nice view and is facing the park with beautiful trees directly behind us.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Prepared for an upcoming challenge or difficult situation
meanings_and_examples.example: The team was fully facing the competition, training rigorously to improve their skills.
